# gcore_keypair (Resource)

Represent a ssh key, do not depends on region

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider gcore {
  user_name = "test@test.test"
  password = "testtest"
  gcore_platform = "http://api.stg-45.staging.gcdn.co"
  gcore_api = "http://10.100.179.92:33081"
}

resource "gcore_keypair" "kp" {
  project_id = 1
  public_key = "your public key here"
  sshkey_name = "test"
}

output "kp" {
  value = gcore_keypair.kp
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **public_key** (String)
- **sshkey_name** (String)

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
- **project_id** (Number)
- **project_name** (String)

### Read-Only

- **fingerprint** (String)
- **sshkey_id** (String)
